p: The screening of antimicrobial activity of EO was performed on a panel of reference strains and clinical isolates (obtained from the Collections of State Scientific Center of Antibiotics for antimicrobial activity): S. aureus ATCC 29213, E. faecalis ATCC 29212, E. coli ATCC 25922, P. aeruginosa ATCC 27853, C. parapsilosis ATCC, A. niger 37a and M. canis B-200. The MIC values were determined by the broth micro-dilution method using Mueller Hinton broth and National Committee for Clinical Laboratory Standards procedures.
